org.openwms.common.comm.api

Class CommConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openwms.common.comm.api.CommConstants

  • public final class CommConstants
extends Object
    A final CommConstants class aggregates common used data and formatting types and provides useful conversation methods.
    Since:
    0.2
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Heiko Scherrer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CHANNEL_SUFFIX
      Used as suffix to create channels dynamically.
      static String DATE_FORMAT_PATTERN
      The date format used in messages.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The converted date String
        Throws:
        ParseException - in case the dateString hasn't the expected format pattern
